item.title: Your password is probably useless, says coding guru Jeff Atwood. Here's why | ZDNet
item.description: <img src="/img/2017/03/passwordicon1.png" alt=""> The best way to improve passwords is to think like the user and stop creating bad password-composition rules, Stack Overflow founder Jeff Atwood tells developers. Source: Your password is probably useless, says coding guru Jeff Atwood. Here&rsquo;s why | ZDNet
